_comment: Created by ianb on 03/10/2013 13:36:30 using v0.9
analysis_commentary: In 2012, inpatients were asked to rate their care experience on a 1 to 10 scale (0 being a poor experience and 10 a very good experience). 87% of inpatients rated their care with a score of six or above in 2012, which could be compared with rating experiences as good or above in previous surveys, which was 92% of inpatients in 2011.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Survey of Adult Inpatients and Survey of Outpatients
